backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, storage mixins, user profiles, investment plans, deposit/withdrawal request types, and various query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking UI external website link features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AuthGate, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/PendingDep: Admin table listing pending deposit requests with screenshot viewing and approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/PendingWit: Admin table for pending withdrawal requests, showing user info and providing approve/reject controls.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Restricts access to admin-only pages, showing loading or access denied states when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders top navigation with links, admin-aware menu items, mobile drawer, login button, and optional external website link.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer with optional external website link.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Blocks app content until user authenticates via Internet Identity, showing loading or login screen.
frontend/src/components/CopyToClipboardB: Button that copies text to clipboard and shows temporary success feedback using toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/DepositRequestLi: Displays the user's deposit requests with loading, empty, and table views, including status badges and formatted dates.
Provides a file upload UI with preview, clear functionality, and support for selecting images via a hidden input.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Implements a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/PlanCard.tsx: Renders a plan's financial details such as deposit, daily profit, duration, and ROI, with optional child components.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalReques: Shows the user's withdrawal requests in a table with status, payout method, account info, and formatted dates.
frontend/src/config/externalWebsite.ts: Provides validated external website URL and label from environment variables, returning null if invalid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity state and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as plans, balances, profiles, deposits, and withdrawals. Uses useActor to call canister methods and auto‑invalidates relevant queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles. Customizes color tokens and applies background and text defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders App into the root element.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays and edits the user's profile, prompting setup if missing and saving details via mutations. Shows profile info and uses identity to generate a referral code.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabs for reviewing pending deposit and withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Allows users to select a plan, view deposit account details, upload a payment screenshot, and submit a deposit request. Handles form validation, file upload, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a list of available investment plans fetched from the backend. Provides navigation to the deposit page and displays PlanCard components.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralsPage.tsx: Displays referral code, link, stats, and bonus tiers using user profile and tier data with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows available balance, accrued earnings, and active plan info using deposit and balance queries.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalsPage.tsx: Provides a form to submit withdrawal requests with validation, limits, and a list of past requests.
frontend/src/utils/earnings.ts: Calculates accrued earnings and elapsed days based on start time, duration, and daily profit.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state for the Earn app, including payment flows, earning plans, withdrawal rules, referral bonuses, and implemented features. Contains architecture notes, requirements, and existing feature versions.
